item.title: Flickr Feed
item.description: Leo Reynolds posted a photo: Kingston upon Hull, East Riding of Yorkshire, England, UK BonCrowder posted a photo: A fun atsign in my fav hex colors

item.title: Chicken Ceasar Salad on a Stick
item.description: Original recipe yields 8 servings Ingredients Directions 8 croutons Step 1 8 (1-inch) wedges romaine lettuce Thread a crouton, romaine lettuce wedge, chicken cube, and Parmesan cheese cube onto each toothpick, respectively.

item.title: Fruit Dip
item.description: Original recipe yields 24 servings Ingredients Directions 8 ounces cream cheese Step 1 ½ cup marshmallow creme Blend together the cream cheese, marshmallow cream and thawed topping.

item.title: Chicken and Waffles
item.description: Original recipe yields 4 servings Ingredients Directions 4 eggs Step 1 ¼ cup heavy cream Whisk together the eggs, cream, cayenne pepper, 1 tablespoon salt, and black pepper in a large bowl.

item.title: Grilled Chicken Salad Sandwich
item.description: Original recipe yields 4 servings Ingredients Directions 1 cup mayonnaise Step 1 ⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper Whisk together 1 cup of mayonnaise, pepper, garlic powder, and celery salt until combined.

item.title: Banh Mi
item.description: Original recipe yields 2 servings Ingredients Directions ½ cup rice vinegar Step 1 ¼ cup white sugar Combine rice vinegar, sugar, and water in a saucepan.

item.title: Spicy Grilled Cheese
item.description: Original recipe yields 2 servings Ingredients Directions - 2 tablespoons butter or margarine Heat a large skillet over low heat. - 4 slices white bread Spread butter or margarine onto one side of two slices of bread.

item.title: Joy's Easy Banana Bread
item.description: Original recipe yields 10 servings Ingredients Directions 3 ripe bananas, mashed Step 1 1 cup white sugar Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).

item.title: Perfect Summer Fruit Salad
item.description: Original recipe yields 10 servings Ingredients Directions ⅔ cup fresh orange juice Step 1 ⅓ cup fresh lemon juice Bring orange juice, lemon juice, brown sugar, orange zest, and lemon zest to a boil in a saucepan over medium-high heat.

item.title: Classic Waffles
item.description: Original recipe yields 5 servings Ingredients Directions 2 cups all-purpose flour Step 1 1 teaspoon salt In a large bowl, mix together flour, salt, baking powder and sugar; set aside.
